Description: You are failing to ensure that the procedures and arrangements described in the current safety case which may affect the health and safety of persons or the environment are followed. A TEMPSC (Totally Enclosed Motor Propelled Survival Craft) is not provided as an alternative means of evacuation on the Leman Golf installation in accordance with LEMAN NUIs-0036-013 ‘Bravo, Charlie, Delta, Echo, Foxtrot & Golf – Installations Safety Case, Rev 013 Amendment 04, Jan 2022. (reasons continued in Schedule).
